page.title: 04COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: THE POST There are 202 post offices in the Doncaster postal area. They operate the countries most convenient banking service National Giro Bank plus Datapost, Royal Mail parcels and Express Post. Four post offices are available in Balby and one in Warmsworth employing 26 people, Â£10,000 worth of stamps are sold every two weeks. 9863 houses receive deliveries in the area from 16 postmen who start at 5.00 a.m. The sorting office for the area is Doncaster which employs 120 people who deal with 15,000 letters a week. A maximum of 40,000 a week can be sorted. The majority of letters go to the big cities. 56% of people use the postcode and an average of 200 letters arrive without stamps.
